title: R.I.P. Season 9
body: Is RIOT (Rito) going to skip Season 9? I heard the word "Nine" sounds like a word similar to "Death" in Chinese, and Riot's biggest market is to China (Also they are owned by a Chinese company). Do you think they will skip Season 9. If so, I'm going for Gold in Season 10.

replies.body:
no.

also.

GD is better place.

Riot is a North American based company.

if a number(not refering to any date, time or amount of deaths in any historical scenarios) offends your whole country.
its not even funny.
9 aka nine can be also used with german pronounciation ,,Nein" meaning no. Season No fitts already pretty good.
4 is china's unlucky number btw, your thinking of japan, the region with one of the smallest league player bases so i think were safe for season 9
I thought that was the number 4?
I don't know. All I know is that 9 is a bad number somewhere in the world.
